item.title: Help on Charge and god spells... All info is here! plz help me!
item.dc:creator: @nd_w0t nd w0t
item.description:
@nd_w0t wrote:

Hey people, Just followed one of the tuts to make charge and the god spells work properly. But ive been having some trouble… Every time u cast a god spell… You go towards the player… And i wanna make it so u stand still when u cast…

Thats one… Very apriciate it if u help me…

Next one is charge… When i cast charge u just see a little purple circle thing waist height… You dont move or anything… I think the animation is 811… And i wanna add that too…

case 4169: //charge spell
if(playerLevel[6] > 79) {
if(charge < 201) {
charge = 400;
sendMessage(“You feel charged with a magical power!”);
stillgfx(308, absY, absX);
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
} else {
sendMessage(“Your current charge is too powerful!”);
}
} else {
sendMessage(“You need a magic level of 80 to cast this spell”);
}
break;

Where do i add it tho? i will get errors =\

Read full topic
